```{r}
library(leaflet) 
library(climproxyrecords)
```

```{r}

# Produce map
leaflet(data) %>%
    addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%
    addCircleMarkers(lng = ~Lon, lat = ~Lat, radius = 5, fillColor = "darkred", 
                     popup = ~paste(Geo.cluster, Core), fillOpacity = 0.5, stroke = F, data = shakun.metadata) %>%
  clearBounds()

```
